Articles.Content: I would like to see complete and independant sets of inputs of translation and rotation for each of Flight, EVA and Rover.  As is, some inputs are unique and others carry over from other areas.  Currently flight is complete, but the others are reliant on Flight for some of the inputs.  This makes it impossible to fully customize each situation.  This will be critical when HOTAS and gamepad support is added.  Oh!  I guess I should suggest the addition of HOTAS and gamepad support too.
